column4: Too bad the VLC thing is an .au address. I'd prefer .co.uk or at least .ie or .be

I liked arklinux, nicer than ret hat (but red hat is what you use in a CCNA, so no choices there), but it was buggy. ACPI didn't work of all things! Ubuntu works. Too bad I got a couple of win32 apps for doing circuit diagrams.
www.winehq.org and they have a repository for getting the most recent versions
